title: Free 10 Draw (1)
full_text:
# 6


6. Free 10 Draw (1)


When I woke up the next day, everything was the same.


“Whoa…”


He let out a sigh that came from the depths of his chest.


It’s been a while since I quit smoking, but it’s the first time since I ate a 6-star party on the 80th floor that I wanted to smoke so much.


decided to accept


The foolishness of a child is now over. This was a pick me up world, and I was summoned as a first-star hero.


The gruesome ability compared to Shay.


Novice class without even basics.


no skills at all This was me now.


I wash my face in the bathroom and cook ramen. The pot I ate yesterday was still there. Wash the dishes while the water boils.


I thought while wiping the pot with a sponge dipped in pom-pom.


What kind of game is Pick Me Up?


If someone is summoned as a pick me up hero with the rules of the game applied, how can he survive?


There are two ways a hero can be destroyed.


dying in battle and disappearing through synthesis.


And I was 1 star.


What does a 1-star hero mean in Pick Me Up?


1 star is consumable for most masters. It is also a low-end consumable. The basic ability is poor and the growth rate is very low. And I’m already annoyed to write it, but I’m often caught in a status abnormality and my combat power is reduced.


The same goes for other mobile games.


The treatment of characters that come out of the free lottery is all like that.


I slurped my noodles.


Before I knew it, I had paper and a pen in my hands. It was something I found in a drawer beside my bed. I don’t know why this is in the room. If you can write, just write.


‘target.’


Scribbled words on paper.


once a goal The first goal is nothing to see. survive in this world


And you need to set specific goals.


If this had happened to any other mobile game, I would have given up. The growth of the character is fixed and the skill is also fixed. No matter how hard you try, you won’t be able to escape from your origin.


But Pick Me Up is different.


Depending on the upbringing method and the individual hero’s ability, a born 1 star can be reborn as a born 5 star hero.


It is because of the potential that is uniquely assigned to each hero. Each hero has other abilities besides the visible status window. It is not displayed as a number, and it is something that the Master must understand while watching the battle.


At first, even if they have the same stars and abilities, a completely different hero is born.


Therefore, in order to become a pick me up master, it was necessary to have a ‘differentiation plan’ to pick out the ‘potential cotyledons’.


The pen writes down the words.


‘target. become stronger.’


Be strong.


Survival, revenge, and returning are impossible unless I become stronger.


It’s not just physical strength. You have to change your mental side as well.


You will never survive with the peaceful mindset you have on Earth.


I don’t know how things will go after that. If you are in a hurry and panic like yesterday, will you be able to survive?


‘no.’


If you don’t adapt, you die.


If you don’t accept it, you get eaten.


I’ve been through this situation before.


Now I’m just a young man who could be anywhere, but it was different in the past.


Childhood. I remembered the annoyed gaze of the orphanage director looking at me. At that time, I had nothing. Parents, relatives and friends. Everyone was the enemy and I was alone.


It came up a lot. I lived a life like war to live a life like others.


‘are you okay.’


accustomed to injustice


The important thing is to calmly assess and accept the situation.


The absurd fact that I fell into the world of a game I enjoyed.


No one should be trusted under these circumstances.


The only one I can trust is me.


After eating ramen, we went out to the plaza.


The square was still empty.


“Isel, are you there!”


I cried.


After a while, a little fairy appeared in the air.


[Oh why! I’m a busy body!]


Even though you’re busy, you come out well.


[I know that because no matter how much I ask, I won’t tell you! Climb the tower if you’re curious. Because there is an answer in it. Oh, of course, there’s no way a 1-star trash like you will go all the way, but kyahahaha!]


Issel grabbed his stomach and burst into laughter.


I don’t get angry. Now that my mind has calmed down, I can check the level of this kid.


[Isel Lv.257]


If it is 257, it is the boss level of the late 80th floor.


“I have a question.”


[They won’t tell you.]


“Is this status window visible only to me?”


[Status window?]


Issel flapped his wings and circled the air.


“Level 257 floating above your head.”


[Ha, do you see this too? I haven’t even researched it yet. It’s annoying. It’s annoying.]


Looking at the reaction, it’s clear.


The message of the game is still only visible to ‘me’.


[Is it because existence is mixed up? After all, he’s been annoying too… Mom! What am I talking about!]


Isel looked around and quickly ran away.


Are the beings mixed up? It’s good.


“Equipment window!”


[Han Israt( )]


[Main weapon: None]


[Sub weapon: None]


[Armor: None]


[Accessories: None]


As expected.


The iron sword I used in the tutorial was a supply that was automatically given to the hero when he had no weapon. Shay, like a 4-star born, had basic weapons and armor.


‘good.’


I clenched my fists.


Even though it’s 1 star, it has a special ability that others don’t have. Being able to observe my condition from the master’s point of view. It will be of great help in your future career.


I am not weeded out never.


decided once again.


But


what if the Master leaves it like this?


“…”


The accident caused by Master yesterday was not an ordinary mistake.


4 stars combined into 1 star. The probability of getting 4 stars in a paid summon is about 1%.


The luck that might happen once in a hundred was blown away by a single control miss.


Pick Me Up is linked to the mobile phone, so it was impossible to restart it.


‘Let’s not think negatively.’


At that time, you just have to go and think about it.


There is no need to waste your energy on an incident that never happened.


I immediately shut myself in my room and scrawled a piece of paper. There were plenty of notebooks and pens in the drawer. If you think you need it, something that didn’t exist was created.


Making is a strategy book. I describe and organize all the information about Pick Me Up that I remember so that I do not forget it over time.


A week passed like that.


[Welcome to Master Amkenna Pick Me Up!]


A hologram window came up with a cheerful sound.


I jumped up from my chair.


[Loading has finished.]


[TOUCH ! (optional)]


[Great fun event for new masters!]


[1. 100 gems a day for 10 days! A total of 1000 gems will be given.]


[2. Special products that can only be purchased by new masters! A new package is available. 5,000 gems and 300,000 gold for only 65,000 won to the master!]


[Write a review and get a star rating!]


[I am the king of capture! On the official cafe…]


Notices popped up, and events in progress were listed.


Events are things that I have memorized most of the time, but I don’t remember.


The announcement was soon skipped.


During the tutorial, I was distracted and couldn’t look, but it’s different from now on. You need to know what type of master your master is in order to devise a survival strategy.


Are you a non-paying user or a paying user?


Are you a light user or a hard user?


I paid attention to system messages.


[Please check the master tutorial reward!]


[500 gems and 200,000 gold acquired!]


‘If you have 500 gems, you can draw once and if you have 200,000 gold, you can draw 20 times free.’


[pop-up! Would you like to purchase a new package for 65,000 won?]


[Yes / No (optional)]


‘I’m not buying it.’


Are you a non-paying user at least for now?


You may still be looking at the estimate.


It would be nice if you could see the game screen itself rather than just looking at system messages, but unfortunately, that function was not given.


So what are you going to do?


In the current situation, I am the only hero. Then, what the Master should do in this situation is…


[Summon a hero!]


[Summon a hero with gold or gems. Choose the infinite heroes summoned by Moebius Summon!]


Infinite heroes are horns.


If my hypothesis is correct, everything like Moebius Thurman or the hero’s unique artificial intelligence are all good. It was only after falling directly into the game that I knew.


[Advanced Summon]


[Perform an advanced hero summon.]


[Summon 1 time – 500 gems]


[Summon 10 times – 5000 gems]


[Summon]


[Perform a hero summon.]


[Summon 1 time – 10000 gold]


[10 Summon twice – 100000 gold]


As expected, Amkena touched the summoning station.


No wonder. There is no way to progress through a stage with only one 1-star hero unless you are a crazy person.


The top is the common ‘paid draw’ with gems, and the bottom is the common ‘free draw’ with gold.


Amkena touched the summon ‘Free Draw’.


[Master 10 series summoning begins. I’m looking forward to seeing what kind of hero will come out!]


[Talkak dururu.]


[Follow me!]


[Common!]


[Master ‘Amkena’ has learned the hero ‘Lyle’!] [


Common!]


[Master ‘Amkena’ Kenna’ has learned the hero ‘Toby ( )’!]


[Uncommon!]


[Master ‘Amkena’ has learned the hero ‘Mormont (★★)’!]


[Common!]


[Master ‘Amkena’ ‘Nim….’


A total of ten messages came to mind. Summoning is over.


I started counting slowly in my mind.


from 1 to 100. I calmed down as I counted. No matter what happens outside, don’t get excited. Don’t panic.


After counting, I went out to the square.


The summoning station was open and 10 men and women were gathered near the entrance of the summoning station.


They chattered in a corner of the plaza with embarrassed faces.


“Where are you? Dream Seal?”


“Ah, it’s harvest season…!”


“Maybe they were brought in by a wizard? We use them as experimental tools…”


“Stop talking nonsense!”


Although they differ in age, gender and appearance, they have several things in common.


The first race is the same. Probably of white descent.


The second one speaks the same language. Neither Japanese nor Chinese. It’s not even Spanish or French. I wrote a language similar to English but with a different feeling, and I can understand the contents. you might be able to say


And the third,


they are human.


“Now, it’s fate that we met like this, so let’s introduce ourselves first.”


A middle-aged man with a handsome beard stepped forward. He was wearing a leather tunic and worn trousers.


A middle-aged man gestured to me from a distance.


“You come here too.”


I trudged through the crowd.


The red long-haired girl pointed to the door of the summoning station and shouted. The door was already closed.


“This brother, he came from outside the door, not from that door! He’s different from us! You might know something.”


“Is that true?”


“Yes, I saw it.” You


‘re being cunning.


I said,


“I’m just like you guys. I’m from that door

.

dialogues.speaker: protagonist

characters.name: Amkena / Han Israt / Han Seo-jin
characters.description: Narrator and player who is both an experienced Master in the original world and a summoned 1★ hero in the game; pragmatic, strategic, focused on survival and growth.

characters.name: Isel / Issel
characters.description: Small, talkative fairy that handles tutorial messages, system readouts, and teases the protagonist; appears to have unusually high level values (Lv.257).

characters.name: Shay
characters.description: Referenced as a comparison point for protagonist's weak stats; represents high-tier heroes.

characters.name: Lyle
characters.description: One of the free-draw summoned heroes (common).

characters.name: Toby
characters.description: One of the summoned heroes (partially referenced, uncommon / ambiguous tag).

characters.name: Mormont
characters.description: Two-star summoned hero from the free 10-draw.

characters.name: Middle-aged bearded man
characters.description: A summoned individual who tries to organize introductions and engages the protagonist.

characters.name: Red long-haired girl
characters.description: Summoned participant who accuses protagonist of differing origin; vocal and suspicious.

characters.name: Other summoned crowd
characters.description: Group of newly summoned humans gathered near the summoning station; share language and general ethnic traits.

themes: Survival and strategy in a game world
Resource management (gems / gold) and monetization pressure
summary: Amkena (a top Master now summoned as a 1★ hero) resolves to survive and grow after reflecting on Pick Me Up's high-risk mechanics, receives beginner rewards, performs a free 10-draw, and is confronted by other newly summoned humans who suspect his origin.
location: Summoning Plaza and private living room (in-game hybrid environment)

notes: full_text: use as canonical raw source for training to preserve exact wording and pacing.
paragraphs: use for chunked summarization, TTS segments, and scene-boundary detection.
dialogues: extract character voice samples and system/UI message patterns for persona and UI modeling.
sections: use to train hierarchical summarization and curriculum learning (setup → conflict → resolution).
characters/themes: use for entity linking, relationship graphs, and tagging gameplay mechanics vs. narrative elements.
